verify_email.intro: Thank you for registering! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.

email_change_confirmation.intro: You have requested to change your email address to {email}. Please confirm this change by clicking the button below.
email_change_confirmation.outro: If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and contact our support team immediately.

email_change_notification.subject: Your email address is being changed
email_change_notification.intro: This email is to notify you that your account email address is being changed from {oldEmail} to {newEmail}.
email_change_notification.warning: If you did not initiate this change, your account may be compromised. Please contact our support team immediately.
email_change_notification.action: If you need assistance, please contact us at:

user_invitation.subject: You've been invited to join {appName}
user_invitation.intro: An administrator has invited you to join {appName}. Click the button below to accept your invitation and set up your account.
user_invitation.outro: Once you accept, you'll be able to set your password and start using your account immediately. Your email will be automatically verified.
user_invitation.expiry: This invitation link will expire in {days} days.
user_invitation.footer: If you didn't expect this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.
